name: Damage Control (itch) (misheelsodgerel)
description:
Demo for a FNAF-style/visual novel game using Ren'py.  

Your boyfriend is getting canceled online. Defend him. As the days go by, more skeletons get dug up from the twitter/reddit closet, and it gets increasingly difficult to defend him. Will you survive the week?

This is using random audio and background visuals from the internet (as placeholders). Coding, storyboarding, dialogue, and audio was created and organized by Misheel Sodgerel. Paul's illustration was done by Sophia Dykstra. Y/N's and the Customer's illustrations were done by Leslie Liu.
